original_text: For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 율법은 모세로 말미암아 주어진 것이요 은혜와 진리는 예수 그리스도로 말미암아 온 것이라

sentences.original_text: For the law was given through Moses
grace and truth came through Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 은혜와 진리는 예수 그리스도를 통해 왔습니다
